languages.text: {n}Культист кровожадно ухмыляется.{/n} "А, новичок. Это правильно, каждый новичок должен перерезать глотку ложноверцу, чтобы показать преданность Пределу рассвета. Понравилось хоть? Не отвечай, вижу, что понравилось. Проходи, {mf|брат|сестра}".

{n}The cultist smiles bloodthirstily.{/n} "Ah. You're new. That's right. Every newcomer must slit a false believer's throat to prove their loyalty to the Edge of Daybreak. Did you enjoy it at all? You don't have to answer. I can see you did. Go ahead, {mf|broth|sist}er."
languages.original_text: {n}Культист кровожадно ухмыляется.{/n} "А, новичок. Это правильно, каждый новичок должен перерезать глотку ложноверцу, чтобы показать преданность Пределу рассвета. Понравилось хоть? Не отвечай, вижу, что понравилось. Проходи, {mf|брат|сестра}".

{n}The cultist smiles bloodthirstily.{/n} "Ah. You're new. That's right. Every newcomer must slit a false believer's throat to prove their loyalty to the Edge of Daybreak. Did you enjoy it at all? You don't have to answer. I can see you did. Go ahead, {mf|broth|sist}er."

languages.text: {n}Der Kultist grinst blutrünstig.{/n} "Ah. Ihr seid neu. Ja, ja. Jeder Neuling muss einem falschen Gläubigen die Kehle aufschlitzen, um seine Loyalität gegenüber dem Rand des Tagesanbruchs zu beweisen. Hat es Euch denn Spaß gemacht? Ihr müsst nicht antworten. Ich sehe es Euch an. Geht nur weiter, {mf|Brud|Schwest}er."
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist smiles bloodthirstily.{/n} "Ah. You're new. That's right. Every newcomer must slit a false believer's throat to prove their loyalty to the Edge of Daybreak. Did you enjoy it at all? You don't have to answer. I can see you did. Go ahead, {mf|broth|sist}er."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kultist grinst blutrünstig.{/n} "Ah. Ein Neuling. Ja, ja. Jeder Neuling muss einem falschen Gläubigen die Kehle aufschlitzen, um seine Loyalität gegenüber dem Rand des Tagesanbruchs zu beweisen. Hat es Euch denn Spaß gemacht? Ihr müsst nicht antworten. Ich sehe es Euch an. Geht nur weiter, {mf|Brud|Schwest}er."

languages.text: {n}Le cultiste affiche un sourire carnassier.{/n} « Ah ! {mf|Un petit nouveau|Une petite nouvelle}... Il est vrai que chaque nouveau venu doit trancher la gorge d'un faux croyant pour prouver sa loyauté à la Lame de l'Aube. Ça vous a plu ? Inutile de répondre, ça se lit sur votre visage... Vous pouvez passer, {mf|mon frère|ma sœur}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist smiles bloodthirstily.{/n} "Ah. You're new. That's right. Every newcomer must slit a false believer's throat to prove their loyalty to the Edge of Daybreak. Did you enjoy it at all? You don't have to answer. I can see you did. Go ahead, {mf|broth|sist}er."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cultiste affiche un sourire carnassier.{/n} « Ah ! {mf|Un petit nouveau|Une petite nouvelle}... Il est vrai que chaque nouveau venu doit trancher la gorge d'un faux croyant pour prouver sa loyauté à la Lame de l'Aube. Ça vous a plu ? Inutile de répondre, ça se lit sur votre visage... Vous pouvez passer, {mf|mon frère|ma sœur}. »

languages.text: {n}这个邪教徒露出嗜血的微笑。{/n}“啊，新来的。很好，每个新来的人都必须割断异教徒的喉咙，证明他们对破晓锋刃的忠诚。你享受杀人的感觉吗？你不用回答，我看得出来你很喜欢。去吧，{mf|兄弟|姐妹}。”
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist smiles bloodthirstily.{/n} "Ah. You're new. That's right. Every newcomer must slit a false believer's throat to prove their loyalty to the Edge of Daybreak. Did you enjoy it at all? You don't have to answer. I can see you did. Go ahead, {mf|broth|sist}er."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个邪教徒露出嗜血的微笑。{/n}“啊，新来的。很好，每个新来的人都必须割断异教徒的喉咙，证明他们对破晓锋刃的忠诚。你享受杀人的感觉吗？你不用回答，我看得出来你很喜欢。去吧，{mf|兄弟|姐妹}。”

languages.text: {n}信者は悪魔のように微笑む。{/n}「あぁ、新入りか。そうだ。新入りは全員、偽信者の喉を切り裂いて、暁の刃への忠誠心を証明しないといけない。しっかり楽しめたか？答える必要はない。顔を見れば分かる。行くといい、{mf|兄弟|姉妹}」
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist smiles bloodthirstily.{/n} "Ah. You're new. That's right. Every newcomer must slit a false believer's throat to prove their loyalty to the Edge of Daybreak. Did you enjoy it at all? You don't have to answer. I can see you did. Go ahead, {mf|broth|sist}er."

traits.locale_text: {n}信者は悪魔のように微笑む。{/n}「あぁ、新入りか。そうだ。新入りは全員、偽信者の喉を切り裂いて、暁の刃への忠誠心を証明しないといけない。よく楽しめたか？答える必要はない。顔を見れば分かる。行くといい、{mf|兄弟|姉妹}」

languages.text: {n}El cultista sonríe sanguinariamente.{/n} «Ah. Eres {mf|nuevo|nueva}. Bien. Cada recién llegado debe degollar a un falso creyente para demostrar su lealtad al Filo del Amanecer. ¿Te ha gustado? No hace falta responder. Ya veo que sí. Adelante, {mf|hermano|hermana}».
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist smiles bloodthirstily.{/n} "Ah. You're new. That's right. Every newcomer must slit a false believer's throat to prove their loyalty to the Edge of Daybreak. Did you enjoy it at all? You don't have to answer. I can see you did. Go ahead, {mf|broth|sist}er."

traits.locale_text: {n}El cultista sonríe sanguinariamente.{/n} «Ah. {mf|Uno|Una} {mf|nuevo|nueva}. Bien. Cada recién llegado debe degollar a un falso creyente para demostrar su lealtad al Filo del Amanecer. ¿Te ha gustado? No hace falta responder. Ya veo que sí. Adelante, {mf|hermano|hermana}».

languages.text: {n}Tarikatçının yüzüne kana susamış bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n} "Haa, yenisin demek. Doğru... Yeni katılanların, Tan Vakti'ne sadakatlerini kanıtlamak için bir sapkının boğazını kesmesi gerekir. Hoşuna gitti mi bari? Cevap vermene lüzum yok, belli ki gitmiş. Böyle buyur kardeşim."
languages.original_text: {n}The cultist smiles bloodthirstily.{/n} "Ah. You're new. That's right. Every newcomer must slit a false believer's throat to prove their loyalty to the Edge of Daybreak. Did you enjoy it at all? You don't have to answer. I can see you did. Go ahead, {mf|broth|sist}er."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tarikatçının yüzüne kana susamış bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n} "Ha, yenisin demek. Doğru... Yeni katılanların, Tan Vakti'ne sadakatlerini kanıtlamak için bir sapkının boğazını kesmesi gerekir. Hoşuna gitti mi bari? Cevap vermene lüzum yok, belli ki gitmiş. Böyle buyur kardeşim."
